column2: On no account!" cried Pulcheria Alexandrovna.
column3: On no account!" cried Pulcheria Alexandrovna.

column2: At first I said I would not take any message to you.	At first I said I would not take any message to you.
Then he said that he would do his utmost to obtain an interview with you without my help. He assured me that his passion for you was a passing infatuation, now he has no feeling for you.
column3: Then he said that he would do his utmost to obtain an interview with you without my help. He assured me that his passion for you was a passing infatuation, now he has no feeling for you.

column2: But I may be mistaken; that may only be the part he assumes.
column3: But I may be mistaken; that may only be the part he assumes.

column2: I shall always, always pray for her!	I shall always, always pray for her!
I... perhaps I shall come... if I can.
column3: I... perhaps I shall come... if I can.

column2: Once for all, never ask me about anything.	Once for all, never ask me about anything.
